topic.title: How to backup a WEB-based Shared Translation Memory DB

body.p:
To backup a WEB-based Shared Translation Memory, we suggest this basic process:
On the server, open a DOS line command (or use the WINDOWS explorer).
Change to the directory where MariaDB is installed in (e.g. C:\MariaDB\).
Change to the directory "\data\".
Copy the entire folder "otms_mysql_db" to your backup media.
